TopicTitle: Is there a mod for a PIP map?

Articles.Content:
Is there a mod for when I am in the game scene looking at my craft I can see the map view on a window?
In this mod is also possible to see the ship on the window when I am at the map view?
In this mod, can I interact with the game by window the same way I would if I was on that view? (exemple: set maneuver nodes or transfer fuel)

It would be nice to be able to set a maneuver node while fuel is transferred
A workaround for that specific problem is TAC Fuel Balancer, but I don't know of anything for the general case you described.

Moving to Add-on Discussions.

(By the way, just in case this hasn't come to your  attention:  A relatively recent KSP update-- I think it was 1.2-- fixed fuel transfer so that it works with timewarp, i.e. you can use timewarp to make your fuel transfer happen faster.  For me, at least, that obviated the "can't switch to map view" problem.)
